definition: lose-lose (situation)/(of the two sides involved) to both be disadvantaged
to lose/to transport/to donate/to enter (a password)

sentences.english: This is the very definition of a lose lose scenario.
sentences.chinese: 這就是雙輸局面的最好定義。

sentences.english: In marriage, success resides more in lose-lose solutions.
sentences.chinese: 在婚姻中，成功往往在於“雙輸”策略。

sentences.english: But in marriage, success lies more in "lose-lose" solution.
sentences.chinese: 但在婚姻中，成功更取決於“雙輸”解決辦法。

sentences.english: It's a loss for both sides.
sentences.chinese: 對雙方而言是雙輸局面。
